original_text: but he shall bring his compensation to the Lord, to the entrance of the tent of meeting, a ram for a guilt offering.
korean_text: 그 남자는 그 속건제물 곧 속건제 숫양을 회막 문 여호와께로 끌고 올 것이요

sentences.original_text: but he shall bring his compensation to the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그는 그의 보상을 주께 가져올 것이라

sentences.original_text: to the entrance of the tent of meeting
a ram for a guilt offering
